segments.text: I need something to wash this down . Is there any juice in the fridge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is that ? It looks like something from a swamp !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a green drink . It's supposed to be full of vitamins and minerals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , healthy eating doesn't have to make you gag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The sales lady said that even if I eat right , I wouldn't get enough vitamins .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever tried it ? Or are you just going to believe the sales lady ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's easier to drink this once a day than eat fruit and vegetables all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It may take less time , but I don't know about easier . Yuck .
segments.speaker: S2
